title: Episode 180 - Red Star Over Tokyo, Part 5
description: This week: the Japanese left is relegated to permanent opposition status in the postwar period. How did the revolutionary moment come to this?
content:encoded: This week: the Japanese left is relegated to permanent opposition status in the postwar period. How did the revolutionary moment come to this?
